tweets.text: @fayedavies It got into my home again about 20 mins ago. I feel trapped & hopeless. I'm home alone & crying on my sofa. I feel embarrassed tweeting this but it's not me that should be embarrassed. It's the @EnvAgency, @EnvAgencyMids, and @RedIndustries2 who should hang their heads in shame.

@HelenVi00175623 @StinkStopthe @SianieRoo @Cap_it_off @EnvAgency @ClareDinnisEA @JamesBevanEA @PHE_EoEngland @StaffordshireCC @AaronBell4NUL @SimonTagg Totally agree, very scary tonight, not like all the others, seems massive gas leak, hope @ClareDInnisEA is there right now to #stopthestink
@Cap_it_off @StinkStopthe @BorisJohnson @MPGeorgeEustice @DefraGovUK @EnvAgency @ClareDinnisEA @BGFinvestments @HSBC_UK https://t.co/ZH3o4hjfRo

tweets.text: @SianieRoo @EnvAgency @DefraGovUK @Cap_it_off I can't believe it's been allowed to go on for so many years and the community has been ignored time & time again. They are "acutely aware" of our concerns and yet continue to accept more waste, causing further odour and sleep deprivation. Sleep deprivation is a form of torture.

We have VERY little research into low level, long term exposure to hydrogen sulphide in the UK, yet @EnvAgency and @PHE_uk seem to want to assure us we are not at risk... please do not make false statements. More research is required https://t.co/UMoaVNnhTe
@scottdegg @StinkStopthe @Feargal_Sharkey @EnvAgency @ClareDinnisEA @JamesBevanEA The government can do something about this but they don't seem to want to ...

So @EventbriteUK you're planning Funtopia in Newcastle under Lyme 19th May. Not sure how much fun its going to be with toxic fug, are you aware of the heaving pile of leaching landfill @StinkStopthe, sorry its late I'm on hold to the @EnvAgencyMids again with a home full of gas! https://t.co/j3d5u47Ufp
@StinkStopthe @Feargal_Sharkey @EnvAgency @ClareDinnisEA @JamesBevanEA both happy to let the bodies pile high https://t.co/RMXbwlP0oT #stopthestink

tweets.text: @Samanth33412592 @LoneRanger77777 @hopeternalall @StinkStopthe @EnvAgency @ClareDinnisEA I just feel like people are getting to breaking point. I know we cannot continue to live like this. Something has to improve or NUL will be a ghost town, with those left ill and isolated #StopTheStink Clearly the system is failing us, we need to explore human rights avenues.

@SianieRoo @Cap_it_off @StinkStopthe @EnvAgency @ClareDinnisEA @JamesBevanEA @PHE_EoEngland @StaffordshireCC @AaronBell4NUL @SimonTagg  this is seriously is not an overreaction. I think we have a critical situation in N-u-L and Stoke tonight. We are watching people falling apart and it's scaring me. It is so bad something major must have gone wrong at the site @StinkStopthe @Cap_it_off

The people of Newcastle subjected to a Saturday night stink as usual courtesy of @RedIndustries2 good job they did all that capping to solve the problem isn't it @EnvAgency? #stopthestink https://t.co/LIRC09yAng

tweets.text: Back home last night. House is full of landfill gas, think i lost my waters, started contractions again and now I‚Äôm back on delivery suite. I AM 30 WEEKS! Fuming with @RedIndustries2 right now. @StinkStopthe @Cap_it_off @EnvAgency @EnvAgencyMids @PHE_uk @PHE_WestMids
@AaronBell4NUL @EnvAgency It‚Äôs horrendous I can‚Äôt sleep headache streaming stinging eyes trying not to breathe to much as I can smell and taste it, we deserve better CLOSE IT DOWN

@StinkStopthe @AaronBell4NUL @EnvAgency How many more years do you expect your constituents to put up with this? You were with the @EnvAgency on Thursday, we expect you to be putting a lot more pressure on them, you wanted to represent this town, we need strong leadership not pussyfooting around. 6/10 must try harder.

@EnvAgencyMids I am trying to email a complaint about the smell from Walleys landfill and your email is blocked. It worked yesterday. This seems rather odd. The smell is inside my house and my eyes are really sore. @StinkStopthe #stopthestink

@AaronBell4NUL @EnvAgency It's not just bad it is totally out of control something very serious must have happed at the site to cause these extremes of gases. It feels literally like a wall and it is extremely scary @StinkStopthe

Landfill fumes getting worse not better. 
@EnvAgency @ClareDinnisEA not fit for purpose @MPGeorgeEustice @MattBors @MattHancock @defra @Cap_it_off @StinkStopthe #stopthestink https://t.co/cm80NJYeVD

tweets.text: @Feargal_Sharkey @EnvAgency They're also allowing kids to be poisoned in Newcastle under Lyme mate.

Dr. Neil Carman, published a study (2001) that concluded growing children are more vulnerable to hydrogen sulphide because they breathe more rapidly, taking in significantly more pollution than adults. @ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgency @StinkStopthe over 30 mins at 5 ppb INDOORS.

domain.name: TV Shows
domain.description: Television shows from around the world

entity.name: Good Morning Britain
entity.description: Good morning, Britain. Up early and need to catch up on the latest news, weather and sports? Then this weekday morning programme is for you, offering the latest information in such areas as entertainment, health and money. `Good Morning Britain' is the typical morning news and talk show. It features a number of presenters, correspondents and reporters covering what you should know to start your day before heading out the door.
